channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Is Right for the DOD
item.description: If the U.S. military wants to maintain its standing with the American people, its leadership needs to display some moral courage.

item.title: How Trump Can Make The Nixonian Dream Of 1,000 Nuclear Power Plants A Reality
item.description: As we grapple with the twin challenges of energy security and energy reliability, revisiting Nixon’s vision offers valuable lessons.

item.title: Will Trump Choose Victory or Defeat in Ukraine?
item.description: Victory is achievable. Defeat would be catastrophic. The choice is now Trump’s.

item.title: Boosted By Out-Of-State Dark Money, Alaska’s Ranked-Choice Voting System Is Here To Stay
item.description: A 2024 ballot initiative seeking to repeal Alaska's ranked-choice voting system was narrowly defeated by 664 votes.

item.title: Let Me Be Frank: Stop Bilking Taxpayers in Order to Bilk Taxpayers
item.description: Governments’ habit of spending your money to convince you to give them more money is getting ridiculous.

item.title: The GOP’s New Coalition Requires a New Economic Agenda
item.description: Help the needy, not the greedy, as a wise man once argued.

item.title: How Trump Can Release Biden’s Regulatory Brake
item.description: Here are some actions the president can take in his first week in office to kickstart deregulatory efforts.

item.title: The Police Report About Pete Hegseth’s Alleged Sexual Assault Vindicates Him Of Criminality
item.description: All of the evidence indicates Pete Hegseth was pursued by a married woman who then regretted her decision to have an affair.

item.title: Ted Cruz urges White House to halt $1.25B in 'digital equity' funds
item.description: Texas Sen. Ted Cruz urges the Biden-Harris administration to halt a $1.25 billion broadband program, calling its race-based criteria unconstitutional.
